events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to their request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and will reach out shortly to assist.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong product. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to verify the issue?
I have attached the photos showing the incorrect product delivered and my order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the info. We will process your refund within 5 business days and provide a prepaid label for the return.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help in resolving this matter.
The refund has been successfully processed and should appear in your account within 2-3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund process is complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case now.
